hero.title: EcoSaber: Education for a Sustainable Future
hero.subtitle: Promoting awareness about Quality Education (SDG 4) to build more conscious and sustainable communities.

about.title: About the Project
about.description: EcoSaber is an initiative that aims to promote quality education as a fundamental tool for achieving sustainable development.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Unequal access to quality education continues to be a significant challenge in many communities. Without adequate knowledge about sustainability, people cannot make informed decisions to protect the environment and promote sustainable practices.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: EcoSaber develops educational programs and awareness campaigns that integrate the principles of sustainable development at all levels of education. We work with schools, communities and local organizations to:
items: Develop accessible educational materials on sustainability
Promote workshops and events to engage the community
Create digital platforms for knowledge sharing
Establish partnerships with educational institutions and companies

about.missionText: To promote quality education and sustainable development through awareness campaigns, participatory projects, and sharing of educational resources.
about.visionText: A world where everyone has access to inclusive, equitable, and quality education that promotes lifelong learning opportunities.

sdg.title: SDG 4: Quality Education
sdg.description: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.
sdg.importanceText1: Quality education is the foundation for improving people's lives and achieving sustainable development. Besides improving quality of life, access to inclusive education can help provide local populations with the tools needed to develop innovative solutions to the world's greatest problems.
sdg.importanceText2: SDG 4 aims to ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all. This goal ensures that all girls and boys complete free, equitable, and quality primary and secondary education.
targets: 4.1 By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education.
4.2 By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys have access to quality early childhood development.
4.3 By 2030, ensure equal access for all women and men to affordable and quality technical, vocational and tertiary education.
4.4 By 2030, substantially increase the number of youth and adults who have relevant skills for employment, decent jobs and entrepreneurship.
4.5 By 2030, eliminate gender disparities in education and ensure equal access to all levels of education and vocational training.
4.6 By 2030, ensure that all youth and a substantial proportion of adults, both men and women, achieve literacy and numeracy.

campaign.title: Our Campaign
campaign.description: We are committed to promoting actions and projects that contribute to quality education in our community. Check out our initiatives:
campaign.initiative1Text: Establishing reading spaces in communities with limited access to books and educational resources.
campaign.initiative2Text: Workshops and training for teachers on innovative and inclusive teaching methodologies.
campaign.initiative3Text: Programs to promote access and use of digital technologies in the educational process.
campaign.initiative4Text: Projects that integrate sustainability into school curricula and promote environmental awareness.
